scenes.name: So she is telling you that she is studying medicine

dialogs.line: Hello, beautiful! You look a little bit tired. Do you need a free massage?
Hey! May I ask you a little question? Do you know how many people live in Auckland?
Good morning! Wow! You are so beautiful! May I get coffee for you?
Hello! I see you are very busy at the moment, but I just could not ignore that feeling which I got when I saw you in the crowd. Maybe we could have a drink sometimes?
Wow! That is a lot of people..  What is making you different from all those 2 million?
Gosh! Two million! Why it is so hard to find a person for sharing food? Maybe we could talk about it over the dinner?
Wow! Seems like you know a lot of things about this city! Maybe you could tell me more while we are having dinner together?
Too bad I can’t buy coffee for all 2 million.. Maybe I could buy one for you at least?
Oh, cool! My ex-girlfriend is a doctor, she could be quite annoying sometimes with her medical advice
Interesting! Where are you studying? In Auckland University? Are there some nice places for dinner around?
Oh, that is cool! I have a rare disorder - I bring flowers for the person with who I am going to have dinner. I will show you! I only need your number so we could make an appointment.
I am very lucky! I have something on my skin right here, could you have a look?
Would you prefer to have a drink or dinner? Not sure if I can afford dinner..
Oh, wow! I am so lucky to get “yes”! I try my luck one more time: may I get your number?
Do you know some good place for dinner? I don’t go out much so I would be happy if you choose the place!
I am vegan, so let me choose the place. You should switch to a vegan diet as well, it is very good for your health.
Is there any chance to try this place with you? My treat!.. Could I get your number so we could arrange the meeting?
You have to show me this place! Could I get your number so I could let you know when I am free?
Oh, no!!! I have this weird allergy on the checkered tablecloth! Maybe I could invite you to Very Nice Place instead? There are nice wooden tables and no tablecloths at all!
Italian? Oh no, my ex was Italian, I still trying to get over that relationship. No Italian please.

responses: Sorry I don't want to discuss that
yes, there is a nice Italian place nearby
